title: Why Am I Getting Disconnected?
body:
i don't know if anyone else is having issues with the client but i've been having way too many disconnects. this is the 4th time i'm getting disconnected for no reason this week and i'm getting slapped with 20 - 30 min time penalties. it's ruining the game experience and extremely unfair. i'm literally playing only two games a day because the wait is so long.

FIX YOUR FUCKING CLIENT, RITO. 

*end rant*

replies.body: Can you give me some more details on these disconnections? Does this happen in champ select or inside a match? Do you see any specific error messages that pop up when the disconnections occur?

the disconnections happen during queue of the match, or while in the loading screen. 

when it disconnects from queue, the game freezes when i press select on the champion i want. and even when the timer goes 0, it does not direct me back to the main screen. it just freezes. then i have to close the client and log back in. only to see that the game still started and my team have already forfeited, which gives me a time penalty.

for the loading screen, no messages/errors pop up until i notice that it's taking longer than it should load. my screen says that i am at 100% but does not allow me to enter the game. when i alt+tab out of the loading screen, an error message appears that reads "you have been disconnected from the game". then the client closes and i am forced to log back in.

Thanks for clarifying that for me. It definitely sounds like your client is unable to maintain a stable connection to the matchmaking and game servers. Most of the time this is caused by local network settings that prevent a solid link from happening, so I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those changes caused any improvement.
